name: Julian Ng
bio:
*Versatile Developer ~ Friendly Team Member ~ Patient Teacher ~ Empathetic Mentor*

Full-stack developer with 5+ years of experience in both service-based and product-based software companies. Some key projects/achievements include:
* Built new features for Starling Bank to grow and enhance their services to customers.
* Extracted David Lloydâ€™s legacy monolith systems into fast & modular microservices.
* Created a tool at Boolean to give students a view of exercise completion rates.
* Mentored several co-workers who sought support for professional and life matters.

keyStrengths.name: Growth Mindset
keyStrengths.description: Avid and quick learner of new languages, frameworks, tools and methodologies to get the job done right, and for my own development

keyStrengths.name: User Centric
keyStrengths.description: Able to engage with stakeholders and analyse data to understand business needs and deliver the best possible user experience

keyStrengths.name: Fullstack Preference
keyStrengths.description: Ideally, involved in the full picture to be able to deliver an efficient and symbiotic product/service

keyStrengths.name: Empathetic Mentor
keyStrengths.description: Guiding and advising peers and juniors through professional and personal journeys
